message: Good morning, this is Alex from SafeGuard Assurance. I’m calling about the billing issue you reported last week. Is this a convenient time to speak?
I suppose so, but honestly, I’m still annoyed. I’ve been charged twice for my last premium, and no one’s fixed it.
I completely understand how frustrating that must be, and I’m truly sorry for the inconvenience. I’ve reviewed your account and have a resolution ready to share.
Okay, what’s the solution? I’ve already spent too much time chasing this.

Thank you for your patience. I can confirm that the duplicate charge of $120 has been reversed. The funds should reflect in your account within 1-2 business days. Additionally, we’ve ensured this error won’t happen again by updating your billing settings.
Alright, that’s good to hear. I was worried this would drag on longer.
I completely understand. To make up for the trouble, we’re also waiving next month’s premium as a gesture of goodwill. You’ll see a confirmation of this in your email shortly.
Really? That’s a nice surprise. Thank you for taking care of this. I appreciate it.
You’re very welcome. I’m glad we could resolve this for you. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s everything. Thanks again, Alex. This has been a huge relief.
It’s been my pleasure to assist you. Thank you for choosing SafeGuard Assurance. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us anytime. Have a great day!
